message: prime mobile?
have you talked anymore about the mobile app for capturing current experience?
ok so phase 2 of project COBRA is coming together, thats prime 2.0 btw
nice, and would want ability to follow it up with a question of what about that image makes you feel/think ____?
pseudo-live-online moderating, we pre-package follow on questions that are triggered based on what people say in questions or canvases
@justine yep, doing a mobile app tie/in connection for prime is very doable, for photo journaling, or day in the life, like your PG cards / data logger, very doable

along with the usual suspects of collaging, photojournaling, i want to try other activity ideas as well like..

love it...
definitely, follow up questions for sure

triggered stimulus questions in canvases, say the user completes a collage, and happens to use key images the researched noted as "special", if the user picks said images, new questions appear based on those images being picked
@aatpootarzan definitely being planned
and eventually I need to copy this kind of activity and put into prime http://www.imaginewords.com/

Could we standardize an About Me page? In general, maybe the templates (pre-created pages already with a bunch of questions). Maybe we could agree on what is good background to have on any participant.
I'd like to see a canvas option that goes full width of the screen - might be better for processes, for example, or for dividing into thirds. Currently the canvas is more vertically oriented.

definitely adding templates of commonly used canvases to prime2, about me, is/not etc, also think we should have image and word sets in there as well that you can pick and choose from as well as uploading
hahaha, I want to get involved in this conversation too with my old work buddies! Hey Dan I want a subscription!
